pkgmetadata.longdescription: Human Gene Annotation Data from 'Ensembl' // Gene information from 'Ensembl' genome builds 'GRCh38.p14' and 'GRCh37.p13' to use with the 'topr' package. The datasets were originally downloaded from https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/current/gtf/homo_sa piens/Homo_sapiens.GRCh38.111.gtf.gz and https://ftp.ensembl.or g/pub/grch37/current/gtf/homo_sapiens/Homo_sapiens.GRCh37.87.gt f.gz and converted into the format required by the 'topr' package. See https://github.com/totajuliusd/topr?tab=readme-ov- file#how-to-use-topr-with-other-species-than-human to see the required format.
